name: Endeavour Demo
description:
You are the Endeavour, a man who has lost everything due to an unknown enemy. The world is in turmoil as mysterious demon-like creatures are now popping up. It is up to you to defeat the 4 Demon lord guards and end the source of all of the chaos. 

This game is heavily inspired by Berserk, an amazing manga/anime series that I highly suggest you read it (I guess watch it, you would kind of miss out on some things, but just experience that amazing series).

If you enjoyed this game and you want to help me, here is a tipping page. Any amount helps:https://gofund.me/45a5fd91

(You can also use Itch.io donation's page if you are more comfortable with that)

Make sure to go support these artists as they made amazing music!

Make sure to go support Shaun Spalding: https://www.youtube.com/user/999Greyfox 

He made a 51 part ARPG tutorial series which made this entire project possible!

Here is a link to a lighting guide that I used for one level: https://www.yoyogames.com/en/blog/coffee-break-tutorial-simple-lighting-gml

(I need to make sure to give credit to everything that isn't mine)

Lastly, if there are any bugs or problems you run into, please leave a comment and I will make sure to fix it. 

Thank you for your time and enjoy! Happy slaying!

|Make sure to follow the facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/Endeavour-Video-Game-103275312051526
